name: HKVerifiableClinicalRecord
desc: A sample that represents the contents of a SMART Health Card.

items.name: var subject: HKVerifiableClinicalRecordSubject
items.desc: Data about the person whose clinical data the card contains.

items.name: var issuerIdentifier: String
items.desc: An identifier that represents the card’s issuer.

items.name: var issuedDate: Date
items.desc: The date when the issuer created the card.

items.name: var relevantDate: Date
items.desc: A date relevant to this record, such as when the issuer administered a vaccine or performed a test.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date when the card expires.

items.name: var recordTypes: [String]
items.desc: An array of strings representing the types of records contained in the card.

items.name: var itemNames: [String]
items.desc: A human-readable description of the card’s contents.
